body.p: The Interpretations Committee observed that most of the liabilities in IAS 37 and in the Illustrative Examples accompanying IAS 37 are recognised at a point in time, that is, when the obligating event occurs. Nevertheless, they noted that, in one example accompanying IAS 37, the liability is recognised progressively over time.
